title: (x) Welcome to the home - FF Angie {Mike Y}
content: It looks like a weight of Rotis Semi Sans
author: dan

comments.content:
[Cicero](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054920/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/presencetypo/cicero/bold/testdrive.html?s=Welcome+to+the+home&p=48) is maddeningly similar, but not quite it.   
   
(FYI, this is not a very easy one to identify.)
